data.lyric:
[ti:Downtown's Dead]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:Downtown's Dead]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Downtown's Dead - Sam Hunt
[00:04.68]Lyricist：Zach Crowell/Shane McAnally/Sam Hunt
[00:09.36]Composer：Zach Crowell/Shane McAnally/Sam Hunt
[00:14.04]The city's so in style
[00:15.48]
[00:17.12]All you see for miles are people spilling in and out of cars
[00:21.20]
[00:22.86]Man I love these bars are making a killin'
[00:25.68]Everywhere I go looks like the place to be
[00:30.22]
[00:31.48]I see people that I know
[00:33.00]
[00:33.74]And I feel like there's no one here but me
[00:36.24]
[00:37.61]Downtown's dead without you
[00:40.45]
[00:43.52]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[00:45.42]Then Friday night it might as well be just another
[00:49.22]Tuesday night without you
[00:52.17]
[00:55.13]As long as you're still in my head
[00:56.98]There ain't a way that I can paint a ghost town red
[01:00.62]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
[01:05.45]
[01:09.79]Dancing in the strobes out here in the throws of loud house music
[01:15.51]Everything's a blur
[01:16.84]
[01:18.54]I don't hear the words but lips are moving
[01:21.56]Try to get involved
[01:22.70]
[01:24.73]But I've about had enough of people wall to the wall
[01:28.53]
[01:30.64]And I'm just holdin' it up 'cause
[01:33.15]Downtown's dead without you
[01:36.22]
[01:39.07]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[01:41.11]Then Friday night it might as well be just another
[01:44.90]Tuesday night without you
[01:47.66]
[01:50.61]As long as you're still in my head
[01:52.67]There ain't a way that I can paint a ghost town red
[01:56.32]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
[02:01.00]
[02:15.01]Free drinks bright lights what am I doing with my life
[02:19.83]
[02:20.90]Okay I quit I've had enough of this
[02:25.20]
[02:26.49]'Cause people are losing their minds
[02:28.71]
[02:29.47]Can't get you out of my head
[02:31.43]
[02:32.54]I'm calling it a night
[02:34.66]
[02:35.48]I'm crawling back to your bed
[02:37.54]Downtown's dead without you
[02:40.47]
[02:43.55]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[02:45.47]Then Friday night it might as well be just another
[02:49.20]Tuesday night without you
[02:52.48]
[02:55.05]As long as you're still in my head
[02:57.24]There ain't a way that I can paint a ghost town red
[03:00.85]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
data.trans:
[ti:Downtown's Dead]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:Downtown's Dead]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.68]//
[00:09.36]//
[00:14.04]这个城市是如此时髦
[00:15.48]
[00:17.12]你目之所及 都是熙熙攘攘的车辆鱼贯而入
[00:21.20]
[00:22.86]伙计 我喜欢这些灯红酒绿的酒吧
[00:25.68]无论走到哪里 都感觉宾至如归
[00:30.22]
[00:31.48]我碰见很多熟人
[00:33.00]
[00:33.74]但却总是觉得孤身一人
[00:36.24]
[00:37.61]没有你 闹市也会陷入死寂
[00:40.45]
[00:43.52]女孩们成群结队 呼朋唤友
[00:45.42]但热闹的周五夜晚对我来说毫无意义
[00:49.22]周二夜晚 身边没有你
[00:52.17]
[00:55.13]只要你还萦绕在我的脑海里
[00:56.98]这里就是荒城一座 了无生机
[01:00.62]繁华褪尽 只余死寂
[01:05.45]
[01:09.79]伴随着喧嚣的音乐 在霓虹闪烁处翩然起舞
[01:15.51]视线渐渐模糊
[01:16.84]
[01:18.54]我看见人们嘴唇在动 但我却听不到声音
[01:21.56]想要投身于滚滚红尘之中
[01:22.70]
[01:24.73]但我早就受够了汹涌人潮 摩肩接踵
[01:28.53]
[01:30.64]我仍在负隅顽抗 只是因为
[01:33.15]没有你 闹市也会陷入死寂
[01:36.22]
[01:39.07]女孩们成群结队 呼朋唤友
[01:41.11]但热闹的周五夜晚对我来说毫无意义
[01:44.90]周二夜晚 身边没有你
[01:47.66]
[01:50.61]只要你还萦绕在我的脑海里
[01:52.67]这里就是荒城一座 了无生机
[01:56.32]繁华褪尽 只余死寂
[02:01.00]
[02:15.01]喝着免费的酒 眼前灯光迷离 我只是在虚度光阴而已
[02:19.83]
[02:20.90]好吧 我退出 我已经受够了
[02:25.20]
[02:26.49]因为人们已经彻底疯狂
[02:28.71]
[02:29.47]但我还是无法将你从我脑海中抹去
[02:31.43]
[02:32.54]我夜夜呼唤着你
[02:34.66]
[02:35.48]如今我又爬向你的温柔陷阱
[02:37.54]没有你 闹市也会陷入死寂
[02:40.47]
[02:43.55]女孩们成群结队 呼朋唤友
[02:45.47]但热闹的周五夜晚对我来说毫无意义
[02:49.20]周二夜晚 身边没有你
[02:52.48]
[02:55.05]只要你还萦绕在我的脑海里
[02:57.24]这里就是荒城一座 了无生机
[03:00.85]繁华褪尽 只余死寂
